application_type_full: Prior Approval: Development for electronic communications network
description: PRIOR APPROVAL FOR THE PROPOSED INSTALLATION OF A 20 METRE PHASE 8 STREETPOLE WITH 6NO. ANTENNAS, 1NO. GPS MODULE, 3NO. EQUIPMENT CABINETS AND 1NO. METER.
site_name: Telecoms Pole And Cabinet Opposite Centre Court
decision_conditions: Reason : 1 - The combined inappropriate siting, design, excessive height, width and bulk of the proposal would result in a visually prominent, dominant and incongruous form of development that would adversely affect the character, appearance and the visual amenity of the Church Road streetscene and wider Conservation Area. The proposal is therefore considered to conflict with Policy CS14 of the Core Strategy 2011, Policies DM D2, DM D4 and DM D6 of the Sites and Policies Plan 2014 and Policy D8 of the London Plan 2021.

Reason : 2 - The combined inappropriate siting, design, width and bulk of the proposal would result in a form of development that would disrupt pedestrian movement along this section of Church Road, and lead to pedestrian and highway safety implications. The proposal is therefore contrary to Policy CS20 of the Core Strategy 2011, Policy DM T2 of the Sites and Policies Plan 2014 and Policy T4 of the London Plan 2021.
